Exceptions
Type Condition
InvalidStatusChangeException

currentStatus: Status, newStatus: TaskProcessorStatus.Active, Only suspended tasks can be continued.
InvalidStatusChangeException

currentStatus: Status, newStatus: TaskProcessorStatus.Active, Cannot continue a task that has never been started.
